abstract: Before Apple’s new plan to increase app production takes off, try some of these existing offerings, including a real-time weather app and a seven-minute workout app.
snippet: Before Apple’s new plan to increase app production takes off, try some of these existing offerings, including a real-time weather app and a seven-minute workout app.
lead_paragraph: AT its recent annual developer conference, Apple made a move to jump-start the production of apps for the Apple Watch by announcing a software tool kit that will enable developers to create more advanced programs for the new device.

headline.main: Video Feature: Apple Watch Apps That Are Available Now
headline.print_headline: Getting the Most Out of the Apple Watch
